languages.text: {n}Иссохшие губы старика кривятся в подобии улыбки.{/n} "Храни вас-с-с Император Ш-шеловеш-шества!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Иссохшие губы старика кривятся в подобии улыбки.{/n} "Храни вас-с-с Император Ш-шеловеш-шества!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}The old man's withered lips curve in the semblance of a smile.{/n} "M-m-may the Emperor k-keep you!"

languages.text: {n}老人枯萎的嘴唇露出了笑意。{/n}“愿——愿——愿帝皇保佑你！”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's withered lips curve in the semblance of a smile.{/n} "M-m-may the Emperor k-keep you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人枯萎的嘴唇露出了笑意。{/n}“愿——愿——愿帝皇保佑你！”
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Los labios marchitos del anciano se curvan en un intento de sonrisa.{/n} «¡Q-q-que el Emperador l-l{mf|e|a} guarde!».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's withered lips curve in the semblance of a smile.{/n} "M-m-may the Emperor k-keep you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los labios marchitos del anciano se curvan en un intento de sonrisa.{/n} «¡Q-q-que el Emperador l-l{mf|e|a} guarde!».
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}老人の干からびた唇がかすかなほほえみで曲線を描く。{/n}「こ、こ、こうていの、ごかごが、あ、ありますように！」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's withered lips curve in the semblance of a smile.{/n} "M-m-may the Emperor k-keep you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人の干からびた唇がかすかなほほえみで曲線を描く。{/n}「こ、こ、こうていの、ごかごが、あ、ありますように！」
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres du vieillard se courbent en un semblant de sourire.{/n} « L'Em... L'Empereur vous g-g-garde ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's withered lips curve in the semblance of a smile.{/n} "M-m-may the Emperor k-keep you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres du vieillard se courbent en un semblant de sourire.{/n} « L'Em... L'Empereur vous g-g-garde ! »
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Die vertrockneten Lippen des alten Mannes bilden eine schmale Kurve, fast wie ein Lächeln.{/n} "M-M-Möge der Imperator Euch b-bewahren!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's withered lips curve in the semblance of a smile.{/n} "M-m-may the Emperor k-keep you!"

languages.text: {n}İhtiyarın kurumuş dudakları, gülümsemeyi andıran bir şekle giriyor.{/n} "İ... İ... İmparator s... Sizi korusun!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's withered lips curve in the semblance of a smile.{/n} "M-m-may the Emperor k-keep you!"
